alert.note: Alert for Camden; Pasquotank (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:33PM EDT until September 30 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN...SOUTHEASTERN PASQUOTANK AND CENTRAL CURRITUCK COUNTIES... At 533 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Old Trap, or 8 miles east of Weeksville, moving northwest at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Shiloh around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Glen Cove, Goose Creek, Riddle and Texas. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
